cscie97.asn3.ecommerce.product

Interface IProductService


  • public interface IProductService
    This is a public interface which declares APIs exposed by Product API service. ProductService implements and defines all the methods of this interface.
    Author:
    ssingh

    • Method Detail

      • addCountry

        void addCountry(java.lang.String countryCode,
              java.lang.String countryName,
              java.lang.String exportStatus,
              java.lang.String GUID)
                throws ContentParameterException
        Adds country to product service, validates properties before inserting and also checks if country is already in the service. Inserts only if properties are valid otherwise throws ContentParameterException. Does nothing if country already exists in the service.
        Parameters:
        countryCode - Country Code
        countryName - Country Name
        exportStatus - Export status of the country
        GUID - user's credentials
        Throws:
        ContentParameterException - when country properties are invalid

      • addDevice

        void addDevice(java.lang.String deviceId,
             java.lang.String deviceName,
             java.lang.String mfgName,
             java.lang.String GUID)
               throws ContentParameterException
        Adds device to product service, validates properties before inserting and also checks if device is already in the service. Inserts only if properties are valid otherwise throws ContentParameterException. Does nothing if device already exists in the service.
        Parameters:
        deviceId - device id
        deviceName - device name
        mfgName - manufacturer's name
        GUID - user's credentials
        Throws:
        ContentParameterException - when device properties are invalid

      • addContent

        void addContent(java.lang.String contentId,
              java.lang.String contentType,
              java.lang.String contentName,
              java.lang.String contentDescription,
              java.lang.String contentAuthor,
              int contentRating,
              java.util.List<java.lang.String> contentCategories,
              java.util.List<java.lang.String> contentCountries,
              java.util.List<java.lang.String> contentDevices,
              float contentPrice,
              java.util.List<java.lang.String> contentLanguages,
              java.lang.String contentImageURL,
              int contentSize,
              java.lang.String GUID)
                throws ContentParameterException
        Adds content to product service, validates properties before inserting and also checks if content is already in the service. Inserts only if properties are valid otherwise throws ContentParameterException. Does nothing if content already exists in the service.
        Parameters:
        contentId - Content id
        contentType - Type of Content ( Application, Wallpaper, Ringtone)
        contentName - Name of Content
        contentDescription - Description of Content
        contentAuthor - Type of Content
        contentRating - Content Rating ( 0 to 5 )
        contentCategories - Categories of a content
        contentCountries - Countries in which content is available
        contentDevices - Devices with which content is compatible
        contentPrice - Price of content
        contentLanguages - Languages a content supports
        contentImageURL - image URL of content
        contentSize - size of content
        GUID - user's credentials
        Throws:
        ContentParameterException - when device properties are invalid or there is no compatible device or there is no country where content is available

      • searchContent

        java.util.List<Content> searchContent(java.util.List<java.lang.String> contentCategories,
                                    java.lang.String searchText,
                                    int minRating,
                                    float maxPrice,
                                    java.lang.String countryCode,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> contentLanguages,
                                    java.lang.String deviceId,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> contentType)
        Search contents in the contentMap based on the search criteria given as arguments of this function. Returns list of contents which match the search criteria.
        Parameters:
        contentCategories - Categories of a content
        searchText - Text in Name or Description
        minRating - minimum content rating
        maxPrice - maximum content price
        countryCode - country where content is available
        contentLanguages - languages content supports
        deviceId - devices content is compatible with
        contentType - Type of Content ( Application, Wallpaper, Ringtone)
        Returns:
        List of Matching Contents

      • getContent

        Content getContent(java.lang.String id)
